Type Alias# LazyFilterIndex

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias LazyFilterIndex<Base> = Base.Index where Base : Collection
```
